entry.em: ..WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM CDT TUESDAY

entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS AFTERNOON
WINDY WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 20 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 50 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE IN THE EVENING
VERY WINDY WITH LOWS AROUND 50
SOUTH WINDS 25 TO 35 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 50 MPH, DIMINISHING TO 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS AROUND 40

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
